name: 19.21h
params: setvar s0, wff w0, wff w1
body: |- wb(wal(s0, wi(w0, w1)), wi(w0, wal(s0, w1)))

comment: Theorem 19.21 of [Margaris] p. 90. The hypothesis can be thought of as " ` x ` is not free in ` ph ` ". See also ~ 19.21 and ~ 19.21v . (Contributed by NM, 1-Aug-2017.) (Proof shortened by Wolf Lammen, 1-Jan-2018.)
